Welcome to m6anet’s documentation!¶

m6anet is a python tool to detect m6a modifications from Nanopore Direct RNA Sequencing data

To install our xpore package and its dependencies, run:

python setup.py install
pip install -r requirements.txt

See our Installation page for details.

To detect modification from your direct RNA sequencing smaple, you can follow the instructions in our Quickstart page.

Contents¶

  • Installation
    • Installation from our Github repository
  • Quick Start

Contacts¶

m6anet is developed and maintained by Christopher Hendra and Jonathan Göeke from the Genome Institute of Singapore, A*STAR. If you want to contribute, please leave an issue in our repo

Thank you!

m6anet
